form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, 43-R0052

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 $5.00 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION TION FEE STAMP OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. CAT and ice issuance N..Y. I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME Sitlani Naraindas Tolaram IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Card with this application if you checked Issuance'' above. IN CARE OF C/O Ranjit Sitlani If you checked Extension you must submit the reentry per- (No and Street) (Apt. NoJ mit you wish to have extended. MAILING ADDRESS 35 North Way ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN U.S. (City) (State) (ZIP Code) Chappaqua N.Y. 10514 A- 34 733 884 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 8/30/1907 Pakistan India black black HEIGHT 5 FEET - INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS Mole on Forehead goingwh 3. DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH Naraindas Tolaram Sitlani WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED Seattle 4 /13/75 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY. YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Naraindas Tolaram Sitlani New York 8/10/77 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: Air India 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD New York Dec 5, 1977 NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL About one year Air India - FILL IN ITEM 7. ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited G-360ATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. sent 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER (date) ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT LAST PERMIT 8/13/75 (City and State) Francisco REASON renewed expired 8/76 fewdays in Bombay IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED. India IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE Handed-in to Immigration officer at Kennedy airport afterputsy. STATE EXPIRATION DATE ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: Retired NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 567-35-0326 MAR 15 1978 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) / Country) 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) Industrial Assr. Bldg., Apt B2, Churchgate, Bombay -20 India India 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): Visit family Joh RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D TRANS.
